text:
If you are compiling JSP pages which contain URI references, like say to taglib 
descriptors, jasper looks up the path to find the first dir with WEB-INF as a 
child and declares that uri-root. But if you want a different uri root, there 
is no way in the JSPC task to declare that, even though jasperc supports that 
facility.


(This bugrep is here to remind me to doc and commit some changes)

JSP compilation at build time is simply excellent for web site dev; once we get 
this task rounded off it will be a great reason to move to ant1.5. Some test 
cases need to go in to QA this task next, I believe.
